Question
========
True or false? An object which is slowing down is represented on a velocity-time graph by a line with a negative slope.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False

Solution
========
False. An object that starts with a negative velocity is speeding up if the velocity-time graph has a negative slope. On a velocity-time graph, slowing down is represented by a line that gets closer to the time axis.
